prompt_base: muscular middle-aged man, deeply tanned skin, large voluminous black afro hairstyle, thick black horseshoe mustache, boisterous charismatic expression, 8k photorealistic photo, stadium lighting
feature_prompt: extreme detailed skin wrinkles and pores, visible chest hair texture, realistic coiled hair strands in afro, high quality fabric texture on cape and gi, detailed mustache texture
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, smooth skin, bald, helmet hair, low quality, blurry, friendly, anime face, flat lighting
